thread.title: Kim Kardashian West’s Court Look in New York City
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian West’s Court Look in New York City

title: Kim Kardashian West’s Court Look in New York City

locations.name: new york city kim kardashian west

text: Kim Kardashian West Covers Up for the Courtroom February 2, 2017 11:32 PM by Edward Barsamian Photo: AKM-GSI It’s getting hard to keep up with Kim Kardashian West’s whirlwind New York City trip. After co-designing daughter North’s outfit with husband Kanye West for a girls-only night out at the ballet earlier this week , and a trip with the kids in statement coats yesterday , Kardashian West returned to the court today to testify in relation to last fall’s jewelry heist . As much as Mrs. West loves to make a grand entrance, she was decidedly demure in an oversize trench dress and over-the-knee boots, a look she first sported in Paris en route to the Balenciaga show . Embed Photo: Splash News Instead of the sandy sunglasses she sported this fall, Kardashian West took a film noir–style turn in an oversize lapel, heavy coat with a waist-cinching belt. The python boots added a fashion-forward ingredient to the sophisticated yet subtle ensemble. As for other accessories, Kardashian West ditched the shades, in favor of her lip ring . In This Story: Kim Kardashian West Recommended For You
